sentences.english: It was painted like a7)gingerbread castle at Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 它的外表塗得跟聖誕節時大家做的薑餅城堡似的。

sentences.english: Make anatomically correct gingerbread people and eat the best parts first.
sentences.chinese: 做成解剖狀的薑餅人，先喫掉最好的部分。

sentences.english: Make gingerbread cookies and bring them to a homeless shelter.
sentences.chinese: 做一點薑餅曲奇，帶他們去流浪者接待所。

sentences.english: Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until firm.
sentences.chinese: 在預熱好的烤箱裏烘焙8到10分鐘，直到薑餅定型。

sentences.english: Better to use gingerbread as Christmas tree decorations.
sentences.chinese: 最好還是用薑餅來裝飾聖誕樹吧。

sentences.english: A soft molasses and ginger cookie cut in various shapes, sometimes elaborately decorated.
sentences.chinese: 薑餅幹，切成各種形狀，有時加以精緻的修飾。

sentences.english: Soon Gingerbread Man was seen by a fox.
sentences.chinese: 一隻狐狸看到了薑餅人。

sentences.english: Gingerbread Man came close to the fox's ear.
sentences.chinese: 薑餅人靠近狐狸的耳朵。

sentences.english: Even before the earthquake, the gingerbread houses left a distinct impression on many Haitians.
sentences.chinese: 地震之後，薑餅屋仍舊保持着海地獨特的風景。

sentences.english: Levels had gone down only in crackers, baby biscuits and gingerbread.
sentences.chinese: 只有鹹餅乾，嬰兒餅乾和薑餅的丙烯酰胺含量有下降。

sentences.english: Soon Gingerbread Man met a bear.
sentences.chinese: 不一會兒，薑餅人遇到了一隻熊。

sentences.english: She said it might be possible to get the same effect by eating ginger cookies, depending on how much ginger is used.
sentences.chinese: 她表示，吃薑餅或許也可能有同樣的效果。

sentences.english: Heat it in the oven, you get a Gingerbread man.
sentences.chinese: 放進烤箱裏，就有一個薑餅人。

sentences.english: Toasted notes of very ripe white peach and gingerbread give an overall sense of great complexity.
sentences.chinese: 成熟的白桃及薑餅烘烤香令此酒頗爲複雜。

sentences.english: In the autumn people would buy gingerbread hearts in Nuremburg at the Christmas market.
sentences.chinese: 人們會在秋天時到紐倫堡的耶誕市集買心型薑餅。

sentences.english: Our Krathong(means bow) is made by banana leaf. The deluxe one looked like a gingerbread house.
sentences.chinese: 水燈是用香蕉葉做成的，華麗版的還真像是薑餅屋。

definition: hand-mixed drink (of the kind sold at a bubble tea shop)
see 愛玉子|爱玉子[ai4 yu4 zi3]
hot pot containing stinky tofu and other ingredients (Taiwanese dish)
